data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sinev, Artem Y., Alonso, Miguel, Sheveleva, Natalia G. (2009): New species of Alona from South-East Russia and Mongolia related to Alona salina Alonso, 1996 (Cladocera: Anomopoda: Chydoridae). Zootaxa 2326: 1-23, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.192078
